me.andrew28.morestorage.chest

Class CustomChestInventoryHolder

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.andrew28.morestorage.chest.CustomChestInventoryHolder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.bukkit.inventory.InventoryHolder

    public class CustomChestInventoryHolder
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.bukkit.inventory.InventoryHolder
    Represents the holder (a CustomChest) for the Inventory that backs a CustomChest
